name: Gorogoa (Original Soundtrack)
summary: Gorogoa’s OST weaves together music crafted for each location in the game into an ambient experience. Featuring a variety of handmade sounds and unconventional themes, each piece is designed to capture the emotions of Gorogoa’s environments and story in ways both unexpected and unique.
info:
• 中文名: 《画中世界》原声集
  • 作曲: Joel Corelitz
  • 版本特性: Original Soundtrack,digital
  • 发售日期: 2017-12-14
  • 价格: 8.99 USD
  • 播放时长: 57:10
  • 发行: Annapurna Interactive
  • 碟片数量: 1
